name: Unfinished Symphony
description:
The deadliest combo, an abhorrently over scoped project, and abject hubris.

Fight a measly six group of enemies randomly selected from three patterns before beating up a blob of color pretending to be a boss.

After each wave of "enemies", pick up an item that drops on the ground to either increase your health (doesn't matter since death isn't even coded in), improve your projectile, or select from three randomly selected powers that modify how you play the game!... If it doesn't bug out of course.

Controls (Poorly):

WASD , Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse - Fling your stick at the enemy

Right Mouse - Throws a projectile that is trying its best to be useful

Space Bar - Dash along with your movement

E - Interact with items

This is not an ironic art piece or an intended meme game. It is a genuine result of horrid mismanagement of time and human resources. Please do not give this "game" any more attention than the bare minimum.
